code: import axios from'axios';import*as constants from"./constants";export var changeDetail=function changeDetail(title,content){return{type:constants.CHANGE_DETAIL,title:title,content:content};};export var getDetail=function getDetail(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/api/detail.json?id="+id).then(function(response){var result=response.data.data;dispatch(changeDetail(result.title,result.content));});};};
